DOC.brief_summary: Background : Cystic fibrosis ( CF ) patient prone recurrent pulmonary infection different secrete mucin pattern healthy subject . Long chain polyunsaturated fatty acid show influence survival MUC5B expression mouse model chronic pulmonary infection . Method : To study impact LCPUFA n-3 MUC5B expression ( mRNA level RT-PCR ) collect airway epithelial cell obtain nasal brush . The secondary aim ass : MUC1 , MUC2 , MUC4 , MUC5AC , MUC7 expression ( mRNA level ) airway epithelial cell obtain nasal brushing ; Lund-Kennedy score ; TNK-alpha , IL-6 , IL-8 blood plasma . This study double parallel , control double blind , randomize clinical trial : LCPUFA n-3 ( 1 g/day ) v placebo 6 week . 30 subject include study . Primary secondary study end point assess two time : randomization 60 day treatment . Statistical analysis : Treatment group placebo compare use U-Mann-Whitney , intention treat per protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Nasal Mucin Oral Supplementation Treatment Respiratory Inflammation Using PUFA Cystic Fibrosis ( CF ) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Outcome Measure : Mucin MUC5B ( mRNA level ) native airway epithelial cell obtain nasal brush Secondary Outcome Measures : Mucin MUC1 , MUC2 , MUC4 , MUC5AC , MUC7 ( mRNA level ) native airway epithelial cell obtain nasal brush . Lund-Kennedy score TNF-alpha , IL-6 , IL-8 plasma
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Cystic fibrosis patient Aged 18 30 year No modification long term therapy ( Corticoids , antibiotic , pancreatic extract , antiacid ) 4 week randomization Awaiting transplantation Patients anticoagulants Contraindication supplementation polyunsaturated fatty acid Taking antibiotic progress ( le 15 day ) Taking anti inflammatory ongoing ( one week per month , steroid , nonsteroidal )
